all.description: Default setting in the 'filter by type' dropdown for the tag browser. Doesn't filter anything out. Should read as 'Show all'.

blocked.description: Select this to show only blocked (checked) tags in the tag browser. Should read as 'Show blocked'.

blocked_redirect_action_through_once_tit.description: Title for the 'Allow once' button on the blocked redirect page.
blocked_redirect_action_through_once_tit.message: Allow tags once until final destination is reached.

blocked_redirect_page_title.description: Page title for blocked_redirect.html which appears when a redirect is blocked.

blocked_redirect_prevent.description: Text appearing on block_redirect.html when a redirect is blocked. Should appear inside "redirect-prevent" div.
blocked_redirect_prevent.message: Ghostery prevented a redirect from $BREAK$ $SP_O_START$$ORIGIN$$SP_END$ to $SP_D_START$$DESTINATION$$SP_END$, $BREAK$which is part of $A_START$$APP$$A_END$. $BREAK$

blocked_redirect_url_content.description: Text appearing on block_redirect.html when a redirect is blocked and a final 'destination' URL is successfully found.
blocked_redirect_url_content.message: This tag appears to redirect to $BREAK$ $A_START$$REDIRECT_URL$$A_END$ If this link doesn't look right and you'd like to proceed, click on the icon below to allow $APP$ and reload.

button_cancel.description: Part of a confirmation dialog. Clicking this cancels the action.

category_advertising.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_advertising_desc.description: User-facing description for the Advertising tag category.
category_advertising_desc.message: Provides advertising or advertising-related services such as data collection, behavioral analysis or retargeting.

category_audio_video_player.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_audio_video_player_desc.description: User-facing description for the Audio/Video Player tag category.
category_audio_video_player_desc.message: Enables websites to publish, distribute, and optimize video and audio content.

category_comments.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_comments_desc.description: User-facing description for the Comments tag category.
category_comments_desc.message: Enables comments sections for articles and product reviews.

category_customer_interaction.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_customer_interaction_desc.description: User-facing description for the Customer Interaction tag category.
category_customer_interaction_desc.message: Includes chat, email messaging, customer support, and other interaction tools.

category_essential.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_essential_desc.description: User-facing description for the Essential tag category.
category_essential_desc.message: Includes tag managers, privacy notices, and technologies that are critical to the functionality of a website.

category_pornvertising.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_pornvertising_desc.description: User-facing description for the Adult Advertising tag category.
category_pornvertising_desc.message: Delivers advertising technology designed specifically for adult content sites.

category_site_analytics.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_site_analytics_desc.description: User-facing description for the Site Analytics tag category.
category_site_analytics_desc.message: Collects and analyzes data related to site usage and performance.

category_social_media.description: Ghostery organizes tags by category. This is one of several tag categories.

category_social_media_desc.description: User-facing description for the Social Media tag category.
category_social_media_desc.message: Integrates features related to social media sites.

category_uncategorized_desc.message: These trackers have not been categorized yet.

click2play_allow_always_tooltip.description: Tooltip that appears over the 'allow always' click2play button.

click2play_allow_once_button_tooltip.description: Tooltip that appears over the click2play replacement for 'social' buttons.

click2play_allow_once_tooltip.description: Tooltip that appears over the 'allow once' click2play button.

copyright.description: Copyright message, shown in page footers.

dismiss.description: Text for a button or link to close a notification.

email_address_in_use.message: That email address is already in use.  Please choose another.

error_email_forgot.message: Hmm, I can’t find that email. Maybe try another?

invalid_email_forgot.message: Sorry, you have to enter a real email address.

invalid_email_login.message: Sorry, you have to enter a real email address.

library_never_updated.description: Text shown in the case when no tag library updates have yet happened.

library_update_already_updated.description: Text shown in the case when the tag library did not need to be updated from remote servers since it's already the latest copy.

library_update_failed.message: Sorry, updating failed. Please try again later.

library_update_in_progress.description: Indicates an update is in progress (might have a spinner graphic next to it).

library_update_successful.description: Tag library update action completed successfully.

library_updated_on.description: Text shown when a tag library update has happened at least once.
library_updated_on.message: The Tracker library was last synced on $DATE$

none.description: Used to say that this item does not belong to any of the groups, as in "Groups: None" (as opposed to "Groups: Group A, Group B, Group C").

not_http_page.message: Ensure that your current tab has http or https page opened

notification_reminder1.description: First line of the walkthrough reminder/notification. Sentence continued on next line.

notification_reminder2.message: for a closer look at some of Ghostery's key features.

notification_reminder_link.description: Link to the walkthrough/configuration wizard, part of the walkthrough reminder/notification.

notification_update.message: We've unearthed some new trackers and added them to the Ghostery Database.

notification_upgrade.message: Our dedicated and uncommonly attractive team has worked hard to release a new version of Ghostery.

notification_upgrade_link.message: Check out the sweet new features and defect fixes in this release.

panel_blocking_verify_account_message.message: To sync your settings and access awesome Ghostery features, please check your email to verify your account.

panel_email_verification_sent.message: $BOLD_HTML_STARTS$ Success! $BOLD_HTML_END$ An account verification email has been sent to $EMAIL$

panel_human_web_learn_more_p1.message: The Human Web is built using world-leading privacy-by-design practices that ensures that any data that is collected is done completely anonymously without any personally identifiable information.  To achieve this, the Human Web implements two core components:  its data collection framework and its proxy network.

panel_human_web_learn_more_p2.message: The Human Web data collection framework requires that the data points contributed by users are evaluated only as a single, aggregated event, disentangling these signals from any personally-identifiable information such as timestamps or user IDS.  Furthermore, The Human Web filters out any sensitive or personal information from URLs that are deemed unsafe (e.g., $SPAN_START$twitter.com/username$SPAN_END$) that can be used to identify an individual person.  Thus, we are neither able to combine data from multiple entries or multiple visits to websites, nor to link this information with any personal information, like email addresses or user IDs, that can be used to identify an individual.

panel_human_web_learn_more_p3.message: As a further safety precaution, this information is sent through the Human Web proxy network, a series of peer-to-peer proxies that remove information like the user IP addresses, making it virtually impossible to determine who or where the data comes from.  The proxy network itself is blind to the content of the data its sending, adding a further security measure to the process.  Consequently, all data we collect is virtually unidentifiable by anyone, including ourselves, so that even if our security were breached by a hacker our outside organization, there would be absolutely no way to tie this information to individuals.

panel_human_web_learn_more_p4.message: The specific data contributed through the Human Web includes:

panel_modal_account_subtitle_1.message: Your Ghostery account lets you sync your settings across browsers and devices and is not associated with any tracker data that you may have opted in to share with us.

panel_modal_account_subtitle_2.message: All you need is an email and password.

panel_modal_ghostrank_p1.message: Ghostery is free because some of our users anonymously and voluntarily opt-in to share data with us about the sites and trackers the browser encounters.

panel_modal_ghostrank_p2.message: Ghostery uses this data to improve our products to help make a cleaner, faster, and safer web. $LINK_START$Learn More$LINK_END$

panel_modal_ghostrank_p3.message: Do you want to share tracker data with Ghostery?

panel_modal_ghostrank_vc_p1.message: We work hard everyday to make Ghostery better for users like you.

panel_modal_ghostrank_vc_p2.message: One way we do this is by collecting anonymous usage analytics to better understand how our users interact with Ghostery to determine what features they like and don’t like.  For example , if you click pause, we will collect a ping letting us know you used that feature.  These analytics are completely anonymous and are not tied to your account or personal information.

panel_modal_ghostrank_vc_p3.message: Do you want to share usage analytics data with Ghostery?

panel_modal_human_web_learn_more_bullet_.message: Search queries along with Search Engine Results Pages
Suspicious URLs that are potential phishing websites
Information related to safe and unsafe trackers
Information related to the prevalence and performance of trackers

panel_modal_human_web_p1.message: Ghostery now implements the Human Web by default, a revolutionary technology that uses the wisdom of the crowd to build a more private internet. Through this technology, users contribute anonymous statistical data that are used to determine the relevance and safety of trackers, websites, and search queries and will soon power new features that dramatically improve how we protect our users. $LINK_START$Learn More$LINK_END$

panel_modal_human_web_p2.message: The more users that join the Human Web, the better it gets for everyone.  Would you like to participate?

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_1.message: Trackers identified by the Ghostery Browser Extension

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_11.message: Tracker weight (megabytes of data attributable to each tracker)

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_12.message: Tracker appearance on any visited webpage

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_4.message: Time it takes for the page and trackers to load

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_6.message: Browser in which the Ghostery Browser Extension has been installed

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_8.message: Standard web server log information (i.e. web request)

panel_modal_learn_more_bullet_9.message: Data sent in response to that request

panel_modal_learn_more_end.message: To learn more about our information practices see our $LINK_START$Privacy Statement$LINK_END$.
